name: Amy's Microwave Caramel Popcorn
author: Rebecca Hooper
instructions: Stir all ingredients, except popcorn and baking soda, in a micro- wave safe bowl. Cook for 3 to 4 minutes, stirring after each minute. Microwave 2 more minutes. Put popped corn in brown bag. Add baking soda to sugar mixture. Pour mixture over corn. Put bag in microwave for 1 1/2 minutes.
